definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: branch(es), bough(s);—usu. sg. coll., abs. ´[[ע]] branches of vine Ez Eze 17:8, pl. only sf. [[עֲנׇפֶיהָ]] Ps 80:11 (both in fig.); boughs of tree, cstr. [[עֲנַף]] Le 23:40, sf. (as if from …[[עֶנֶף]] Kö:ii. 1, 74) [[עַנְפְּכֶם]] Ez Eze 36:8; sg. abs. (in fig.) Mal 3:19, of cedar Ez Eze 17:23, Eze 31:3.
